exceptions.exn: The reference not_all_ex_not was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T x P H. apply not_all_ex_not in H. destruct H as [eps H]. exists (mkposreal (Rmin (pos eps) (/2))). intros y H'. apply not_all_ex_not in H. destruct H as [y' H]. apply not_all_ex_not in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. intros H3. apply H2. apply (Req_lt_aux (pos eps) (/2)). apply Rle_lt_trans with ((/2) + (pos y)). apply Req_le_aux. intros eps'. apply Rmin_case; auto. apply Rmax_lub_lt. apply (Rlt_irrefl (pos y)). apply H'. apply H1 with y'; auto. apply Rlt_le_trans with (pos y). apply Rnot_le_lt. intros G. apply H. intros y' Hball. apply G. apply Rlt_le_trans with ((/2) + pos y). apply Rmin_case; auto. apply Rmax_lub_lt. apply (Rlt_irrefl (pos y)). apply Hball.
